works.complaint:
The owner of the blog has named me as impersonating  
someone else, and has indicated that i may be two different people. The  
owner of the blog has also included photographs of myself and my Husband  
that have been taken from Facebook without our consent (the owner of the  
blog has no access to our accounts but seems to have used screen captures 

and resized the images rendering them blurry). The content of the blog is 

slanderous in that it violates my right to privacy and also presents a  
distorted and untrue account of myself and my family - my name is
Christine  
Moloney and i have never masqueraded as anyone else, nor am i married to  
anyone but my Husband. I am mentioned by name in every blog post and my  
Husband also. I am not 'hired out' or playing a double game. I am a  
lecturer by profession and if a prospective employer stumbles across this,
 
or a student, it could cause huge problems. The owner of this blog has
been  
taken to court numerous times for libellous blogs and websites. If this is
 
not taken down i will have to ask the courts for redress.
